Message:
It was hard to dance
with the cat-girl.

Really hard.
Though, I did kind of
expect that.

That girl really doesn’t
change though, huh?

She’s still watches me dance
with the same beautiful eyes.

Those shimmering,
sparkly eyes that stare at me
with pure admiration.
I can’t afford to lose to her.

Simply visiting my homeland
isn’t good enough anymore.

While I’m at it,
I think I’ll go and take
everyone by storm, too.

I won’t stop until I have
people from all over
experience this new
dance of mine.

With this new outlook
on life that meeting
those two gave me...

and this one of a kind
dance—my dance—

I’m going to mesmerize
the entire world!
